title: PERMABANNED APPEAL
body:

Igot banned after a month of my 2 week ban during that time i did not get a single report and i had a fight with my mom that day which already tilted me off the planet。what tilted me that game was becayse my support kept taking cs so iobviously tried to ping her not but she kept doing it。it was a mistake i harshly regret。I DONT DESERVE THIS BECAUSE I RIED REFORMING AFTER THE TWO WEEKS SRY FOR CAPS

It doesn't matter if you tried to reform, it matters if you did.

Don't bring your real life drama online. It's not a good idea anywhere, much less in League.

You cannot know that you did not get a single report as Riot doesn't tell you if you're reported, only punished.

Sorry to say this but if you don't reform, even while trying, after a 14-day ban chances are you won't in the near future. 

This risk of unbanning you is too high for the reward to be worth it.
Well hey at least you tried.
They said it wasn't just this one game, so you're lying?!

if you didn't use the homophobic slur, maybe you wouldn't get punished right away.

But everything else in that chatlogs is still punishment worthy, just not worthy of immediate punishment.

If you are consistent with that attitude (even without the slur), you'll still get permabanned in due time.
You can't appeal a permanent suspension. Its final. Unless you're a pro you have no chance of getting this final strike on your account removed.

> [{quoted}](name=lol projectiles,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vbpAodhp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-07-08T22:28:58.764+0000)
>
> Unless you're a pro you have no chance of getting this final strike on your account removed.

Wrong, pro players do not get their account bans lifted.
Only the bans against their person - which the average player cannot receive in the first place- are lifted, not the account ban.
Please stop spreading bullshit.
I have never heard of any pro getting their account back after being permanently banned. Mind explaining?

Several pros received "indefinite suspensions from competitive play" along with account suspensions (most notably, Jensen). However, they never recovered any of their account bans, and had to demonstrate ~6-18 months of being reformed to be able to qualify for professional play again.

I know about that, but the point was that none of them ever got the account back. 

Indefinite doesn't necessarily mean permanently, so the entire last half of LoL Projectiles' comment was wrong, right?
toxic man, learn to not type.

> just hope riot can give me another chance

I think they just did when they gave you that 14 days suspension. Go make a new account.

Lol you would've gotten from 0 punishments straight to a 14 day ban just for saying something that gets written as %%% on boards. Obv you will never get another chance for going from 14 day to perma ban after usin another naughty word declared by rito. Just make another account and play the system next time, maybe you could learn something about not being an easy ban
